segue_the_chain: From isolation to a song that opens with the lyric ‘You’re on your own’ and drones on and on about being alone…

segue_dave.line: The album "A String Quartet Tribute to New Order and Joy Division" by Vitamin String Quartet is a tribute to Joy Division, and the same album is also a tribute to New Order...
segue_dave.explanation: Joy Division is a tribute to the record A String Quartet Tribute to New Order and Joy Division and New Order is a tribute to the record A String Quartet Tribute to New Order and Joy Division
